burlap.oomdp.singleagent.pomdp.beliefstate

Interface BeliefState

  • All Superinterfaces:
    State
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TabularBeliefState

    public interface BeliefState
extends State
    An interface for defining a belief state, which is a probability distribution over MDP states. This interface does not require enumerating all states, because it is possible to have a belief state over an infinite number of MDP states. However, it does require that the probability density function be returnable (belief(burlap.oomdp.core.states.State), to be able to sample an MDP state from the belief distribution sampleStateFromBelief(), and a mechanism to update the belief state with respect to some observation and action getUpdatedBeliefState(burlap.oomdp.core.states.State, burlap.oomdp.singleagent.GroundedAction).
    Author:
    James MacGlashan and Nakul Gopalan

      • belief

        double belief(State s)
        Returns the probability density/mass for the input MDP state.
        Parameters:
        s - the the input MDP state defined by a State instance.
        Returns:
        the probability density/mass of the input MDP state in this belief distribution.

      • sampleStateFromBelief

        State sampleStateFromBelief()
        Samples an MDP state state from this belief distribution.
        Returns:
        an MDP state defined by a State instance.

      • getUpdatedBeliefState

        BeliefState getUpdatedBeliefState(State observation,
                                GroundedAction ga)
        Computes a new belief distribution using this BeliefState as the prior and conditioned on the given POMDP observation and action taken.
        Parameters:
        observation - the conditioned POMDP observation defined by a State instance.
        ga - the conditioned action selection in the previous time step.
        Returns:
        the new belief state distribution represented by a new BeliefState instance.
